word:
Letter 5, 1870
     611. We place no butter upon our table. Our vegetables are generally cooked with milk or cream and made very palatable. . . . We think a moderate amount of milk from a healthy cow not objectionable. 
                                                                           358

     [MILK AND CREAM USED IN THE WHITE HOME--APPENDIX I:4, 13, 14, 16, 22] 
     [USE OF MILK AND CREAM IN THE PREPARATION OF FOOD--517, 518, 522] 
     [RECOMMENDED FOR CAMP MEETING DIET--491]
